page.title: 09Mattingley Area - Farming.
page.content: {The block is intensively farmed. Priors{Farm (F.),}Money's F., Cowfold F., Lynchmere F. & Kale F. have one owner. Other farms are: West End F., Bluehouse F., Bunkers Hill F., Little Church F., Bartletts F., Whiteknights F., West Green F., Hazeley Bottom F., Hartley Grange F., & parts of Whitehouse F. & Thackhams F. The County Council own Arcadia F., Hazeley F., Church F., & Creek Farm - a legacy from W.W.1 times! { Livestock is mainly dairy cows.}There are also beef cattle (one farm has 150 Charolais), sheep & poultry. One farm provides winter accommodation for Clapton's donkeys & West Green House, until recently, had a herd of Llama (only 1 left now). The{main crops are {Wheat, Barley, Oats & Oil-seed Rape plus beans, maize & grass for hay/silage.
